1: Yahweh, you have examined me, and you know me.\q
2:
You know when I sit down and when I get up;\q you understand my thoughts from far away.


\q
3:
You observe my path and my lying down;\q you are familiar with all my ways.
\q
4:
For before there is a word on my tongue,\q you know it completely, Yahweh.
\q
5:
Behind me and before me you surround me\q and place your hand upon me.
\q
6:
Such knowledge is too much for me;\q it is too high, and I cannot reach it.


\q
7:
Where can I go from your Spirit?\q Where can I flee from your presence?
\q
8:
If I ascend up to the heavens, you are there;\q if I make my bed in Sheol, behold, you are there.


\q
9:
If I fly away on the wings of the morning\q and go to live in the uttermost parts across the sea,
\q
10:
even there your hand will lead me,\q your right hand will hold on to me.


\q
11:
If I said, "Surely the darkness will cover me,\q and the light will become night around me,"
\q
12:
even the darkness would not be dark to you.\q The night would shine like the day,
\q for the darkness and the light are both alike to you.


\q
13:
You formed my inner parts;\q you formed me in my mother's womb.
\q
14:
I will praise you,\q for I am wonderfully made.
\q My soul knows this very well.


\q
15:
My bones were not hidden from you\q when I was made in private,
\q when I was intricately made in the depths of the earth.
\q
16:
You saw me inside the womb;\q all the days assigned to me were recorded
\q in your book even before the first one happened.


\q
17:
How precious are your thoughts to me, God!\q How vast is their sum!
\q
18:
If I tried to count them, they would be more in number than the sand.\q When I awake, I am still with you.


\q
19:
If only you would kill the wicked, God;\q get away from me, you violent men.
\q
20:
They rebel against you and act deceitfully;\q your enemies tell lies.


\q
21:
Do I not hate those, Yahweh, who hate you?\q Do I not despise those who rise up against you?
\q
22:
I hate them completely;\q they have become my enemies.


\q
23:
Examine me, God, and know my heart;\q test me and know my thoughts.
\q
24: See if there is any wicked way in me,\q and lead me in the everlasting way.
